mapper.select:
DECLARE @roleID INT SELECT @roleID=roleid FROM dbo.account WHERE id=#{accountId} IF @roleID>0 SELECT #{accountId} AS AccoutId , MenuId , ParId , MenuName , ISNULL(Url, '') AS Url , amc.IsButton , ISNULL(javaUrl, '/order/list') AS javaUrl FROM AuthorityMenuClass amc ( NOLOCK ) JOIN dbo.AuthorityRoleMentMenuSet aam ( NOLOCK ) ON aam.MenuId = amc.Id WHERE aam.RoleId = @roleID AND amc.BeLock = CAST(0 AS BIT) UNION
SELECT #{accountId} AS AccoutId , id AS MenuId , ParId , MenuName , ISNULL(Url, '') AS Url , IsButton , ISNULL(javaUrl, '/order/list') AS javaUrl FROM AuthorityMenuClass WHERE ParId = 0 AND BeLock = CAST(0 AS BIT) AND id IN ( SELECT ParId FROM dbo.AuthorityRoleMentMenuSet aam ( NOLOCK ) JOIN AuthorityMenuClass amc ( NOLOCK ) ON aam.MenuId = amc.Id WHERE aam.AccoutId = #{accountId} and amc.IsButton=0 AND amc.BeLock = CAST(0 AS BIT) ) ELSE SELECT AccoutId , MenuId , ParId , MenuName , ISNULL(Url, '') AS Url , amc.IsButton , ISNULL(javaUrl, '/order/list') AS javaUrl FROM AuthorityMenuClass amc ( NOLOCK ) JOIN dbo.AuthorityAccountMenuSet aam ( NOLOCK ) ON aam.MenuId = amc.Id WHERE aam.AccoutId = #{accountId} AND amc.BeLock = CAST(0 AS BIT) UNION
SELECT #{accountId} AS AccoutId , id AS MenuId , ParId , MenuName , ISNULL(Url, '') AS Url , IsButton , ISNULL(javaUrl, '/order/list') AS javaUrl FROM AuthorityMenuClass WHERE ParId = 0 AND BeLock = CAST(0 AS BIT) AND id IN ( SELECT ParId FROM dbo.AuthorityAccountMenuSet aam ( NOLOCK ) JOIN AuthorityMenuClass amc ( NOLOCK ) ON aam.MenuId = amc.Id WHERE aam.AccoutId = #{accountId} and amc.IsButton=0 AND amc.BeLock = CAST(0 AS BIT) )
SELECT * , -1 AS accoutid FROM AuthorityMenuClass a WITH ( NOLOCK ) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT b.MenuId FROM AuthorityAccountMenuSet b WITH ( NOLOCK ) WHERE b.AccoutId = #{userID} ) t ON a.Id = t.MenuId
